summary: Build a playful single-page "Propose Day Surprise" web page with Yes/No buttons, where the No button dodges the cursor and the Yes button reveals a message and an image.
architectural_notes: Static HTML/CSS/JS single-page implementation; no frameworks mentioned.
Requires bundling/providing the image asset "happy_propose_day.jpg" at the expected relative path.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Romantic ‚ÄúHappy Propose Day‚Äù illustration/banner with warm festive hearts and a cheerful couple silhouette (happy_propose_day.dim_1200x800.jpg)

existing_features.title: Create a single-page React UI that reproduces the provided ‚ÄúPropose Day Surprise‚Äù layout: centered heading text ‚ÄúWill you always be mine?‚Äù, a two-button row (Yes / No) in a constrained container, and an initially-empty output area below.

Implement styling in Tailwind/CSS to match the provided visual design: Comic Sans-like playful typography, warm yellow/orange diagonal gradient background, large heading with subtle shadow, rounded pill buttons with drop shadows, and the output image with rounded corners and glow shadow.

Implement the interactive behavior for the ‚ÄúNo, never!‚Äù button: when the cursor enters the button, it moves to a random position within its button container; when clicked, it shows an alert with the exact English text: ‚ÄúHaha! You can't say no! Gotta be mine! üòú‚Äù.

Implement the ‚ÄúYes ‚ù§Ô∏è‚Äù button behavior: on click, render the success message ‚ÄúYay! You're mine forever! üíñ‚Äù and display the image ‚Äúhappy_propose_day.jpg‚Äù with alt text ‚ÄúHappy Propose Day‚Äù in the output area, then scroll the output area into view with smooth behavior.

Apply a coherent, playful visual theme consistently across the page (colors, typography, spacing, shadows) that fits a ‚ÄúPropose Day Surprise‚Äù vibe, using warm yellows/oranges/pinks/greens (do not introduce a blue/purple primary palette).

Add the required static image asset(s) to the frontend and reference them directly from the UI (do not fetch images via the backend). Place generated images under frontend/public/assets/generated and ensure the UI uses the correct path.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a single-page "Propose Day Surprise" HTML/CSS layout with centered heading and two buttons (Yes/No) using the specified gradient theme and styling.
Implement interactive behavior: the No button moves to a random position within its container on mouseenter and shows an alert on click.
Implement Yes button behavior to render a success message and display an image (happy_propose_day.jpg) in the output area, then scroll output into view.
